original:
The biological underpinnings of basic cognition remain inadequately defined for numerous species and have not been sufficiently generalized to encourage further research. This gap in understanding can be attributed to the absence of a dedicated scientific discipline focused on elucidating the cognitive abilities shared by all biological organisms. Currently, a formal science of cognitive biology has not been established.
